Package GUI

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
GUI.StudentController
public class StudentController extends Object
A class that controls the student tab in the GUI. It is responsible for initializing, updating the GUI and handling the input.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sevastian Bahynskyi (logic for handling user input), Michael Leo, Hugo Madrid PeГ±arrubia, Kateryna Sokolova
